author: cbs8
title: Come Meet Fixstars in Hollywood
text:
Fixstars Solutions, Inc.
Fixstars will see you at booth 111 at SMPTE 2015
SUNNYVALE, Calif. , Oct. 22, An innovator in flash storage, Fixstars Solutions, Inc. is going to Hollywood to attend Society of Motion Picture & Television Engineers (SMPTE) 2015 Annual Conference from October 26th to 29th .
Earlier this month, Fixstars launched the IRIS-DRIVE, a 2 Terabyte professional flash storage device tailored for 4K recording. As the media and entertainment industry moves towards Ultra-HD, 4K/8K video-shooting is becoming the standard format. At the same time, a fast and reliable storage solution has become just as important as a large capacity.
With the 3 and 6TB high-capacity enterprise line SSDs, Fixstars caught the eyes of media and entertainment professionals and showed potential as an ideal partner for video-shooting devices. Among these is ATOMOS, a leading player in camera-mounted recorders, which has officially recognized Fixstars as a certified storage partner. In dedication to this collaboration, Fixstars' IRIS-DRIVE was selected as a recommended drive for ATOMOS' "SHOGUN" and "NINJA ASSASSIN" series. This is the largest capacity SSD available on video recorders.
Fixstars looks forward to more upcoming collaborations in media and entertainment to help more video-shooting enthusiasts with reliable and high-performance storage.
SMPTE 2015 will be held at:
Loews Hollywood Hotel
1755 North Highland Avenue
Hollywood, CA 90028
Contact:
Shien Zhu
6502820598
